page.title: 10THE COMPUTER
page.content: Our school has an {ACORN B}computer. We have had it now for two years. We have also got a {VALIANT}"Felicity" turtle. You place it on the floor and type in on the computer where you want her to go. If the printer is plugged in too, whatever Felicity does comes out onto the paper. She can turn , beep and park. We have lots of computer adventures like "Spacex" and "Grannies Garden" ; simulations like "Teashop" and "Candyfloss" ; we write with "Primary pen" and "Wordwise" and draw with "Ollie Octopus". There are also some arcade games but we don't often use them - only after school sometimes. I like computers . My brother wants one for Christmas. I enjoy using the computer because if there is no one else to play with you can still have a game and the computer doesn't alwaya win.
